botMissingPermission.title: Missing Permission
botMissingPermission.description: This bot is unable to use the channel you selected because of the following missing the following permission(s): {{ permissions }}. You can either grant the bot the permissions listed or select a different channel the bot can use.

userMissingPermission.title: Missing Permission
userMissingPermission.description: You must have the **Manage Webhook(s)** permission to use this command. These permission(s) can either be granted server-wide or given through a channel's advanced permissions.

view.title: Current Configuration

maxLength.name: Over Max Length
maxLength.value: The error is over 1024 characters long

introduction.name: Introduction
introduction.value: NotifHy is a notification bot for Hypixel. Share logins with friends, get reminders to claim daily rewards, and get alerts on suspicious activity. This bot is the successor to HyGuard, which you can read about [here](https://hypixel.net/threads/discord-bot-hyguard-a-bot-that-monitors-your-account-24-7.4368395/ "Hypixel Forums").

modules.name: Modules
modules.value:
Modules are how different types of notifications are separated. Once you register, simply select and configure the modules you want to use.

‚Ä¢ The Defender module is an implementation of [HyGuard](https://hypixel.net/threads/discord-bot-hyguard-a-bot-that-monitors-your-account-24-7.4368395/ "Hypixel Forums")
‚Ä¢ The Friends module sends your login and logouts to a channel to share
‚Ä¢ The Rewards module sends you a DM reminding you to claim your daily reward

setup.name: Setup
setup.value:
‚Ä¢ You should use a server that you own or is owned by your friends
‚Ä¢ Invite the bot by clicking [here](https://notifhy.attituding.live/invite/ "Invite") and granting the OAuth2 scopes
‚Ä¢ Use **/register** followed by your username or UUID
‚Ä¢ Using **/discord** on Hypixel may be required to link or relink your Discord account to your Minecraft account
‚Ä¢ Use **/modules** followed by the module you are interested in
‚Ä¢ Configure the module by clicking on the select menus and buttons. The **Toggle** setting will tell you what settings need to be configured before you can enable the module
‚Ä¢ **/channel** may be required for some modules in order to tell the bot where you want alerts/notifications to go

other.name: Other Information
other.value: Learn more at https://notifhy.attituding.live/ or the GitHub page below.

legal.name: Legal Stuff
legal.value: By using this service, you agree to our [Privacy Policy](https://notifhy.attituding.live/legal/privacy-policy/ "Privacy Policy") and our [Terms of Service](https://notifhy.attituding.live/legal/terms-of-service/ "Terms of Service").

dm.value: This command cannot be used in a DM channel

embed.title: Oops
embed.description: An error occurred while executing the command **/{{ commandName }}**! This error has been automatically forwarded for review. It should be resolved soon. Sorry.

devMode.description: This bot is in developer only mode, likely due to a major issue or an upgrade that is taking place. Please check back later!

embed1.title: Cooldown
embed1.description: You are executing commands too quickly! The cooldown of this command is {{ cooldown }} seconds. This message will turn green in {{ timeLeft }} seconds once the cooldown expires.

embed2.title: Cooldown Over
embed2.description: The cooldown has expired! You can now execute the command **/{{ commandName }}**!
